name: NICORETTE QUICK MIST SPRAY 1 MG
treatmentDescriptions: Nicorette Quick Mist relieves and/or prevents craving and nicotine withdrawal symptoms in nicotine dependence, such as those arising from the use of tobacco or electronic cigarettes.It is indicated in adults, to aid quitting or reduction prior to quitting, to assist those who are unwilling or unable to use such products, and as a safer alternative to smoking tobacco for smokers and those around them.Nicorette Quick Mist is indicated in pregnant and lactating women making a quit attempt.

packaging.name: NICORETTE QUICK MIST SPRAY 1 MG 13.2 ML
